title: About
body:
#About

## A bit of history

OpenAero was mainly designed in 2006 to help cataloging open resources related to aviation.

The [GNU/Linux Aviation HOWTO](http://tldp.org/HOWTO/html_single/Aviation-HOWTO/) was one of the driver.

## The goals

OpenAero wants to:

 - help people using open data in the aviation
 - mix and match tools and data
 - share knowledge in order to obtain greater resilience
